projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects I've built, ranging from AI-powered tools to large-scale data systems

quillbotFlow.title: QuillBot Flow
quillbotFlow.subtitle: AI Writing & Research Workspace
description: QuillBot Flow is an all-in-one AI-powered writing and research workspace that unifies drafting, editing, paraphrasing, summarization, citations, grammar checking, and AI assistance into a single seamless interface.
Owned end-to-end engineering of QuillBot Flow, contributing across frontend, backend, and AI integration layers to deliver a cohesive, production-ready writing experience.
Designed and implemented a unified writing canvas architecture, enabling multiple AI-powered tools to operate seamlessly within a single editor without disrupting the user's writing flow.
highlights: Integrated AI-assisted text generation and autocomplete capabilities for real-time ideation and content refinement
Built tool orchestration logic for paraphrasing, summarization, grammar checking, citation generation, and research features to work together smoothly
Engineered low-latency interactions through optimized client-side state management and asynchronous AI calls
Implemented session persistence, autosave, and restore mechanisms for seamless long-form writing
Designed modular components and reusable services supporting rapid feature expansion and high concurrent usage
impact: Eliminated context switching by consolidating multiple writing tools into one AI-driven workspace
Improved writing speed and productivity through real-time AI assistance
Enhanced user engagement and retention with intuitive end-to-end writing workflow

cms.title: Tina CMS
cms.subtitle: SEO-Driven Content Management Platform
description: Tina CMS is a modern, SEO-focused content management system designed to enable rapid creation, management, and publishing of high-performance web pages with minimal engineering effort.
Designed and developed a scalable, SEO-first CMS architecture that significantly reduced engineering dependency for content creation and page updates.
The platform empowers non-technical teams to manage content independently while ensuring scalability, performance, and search engine optimization best practices.
highlights: Implemented dynamic page generation and content-driven routing for rapid publishing without code changes
Built flexible content schemas and reusable components for efficient page composition with brand consistency
Integrated on-page SEO controls including metadata management, structured data, and search-friendly URLs
Optimized page load performance and rendering strategies for improved Core Web Vitals
Developed editor-friendly workflows and preview environments for safe content iteration
impact: Reduced page development effort by ~80%, enabling faster go-to-market
Improved SEO performance and organic traffic through optimized page structures
Empowered non-engineering teams to publish content independently

paraphrasingTool.title: Paraphrasing Tool
paraphrasingTool.subtitle: AI-Powered Writing Enhancement
description: QuillBot's Paraphrasing Tool is a core AI-driven writing product used by millions of users to rewrite, refine, and enhance text while preserving original meaning and intent.
Contributed to the design and evolution of the core paraphrasing engine, integrating applied NLP techniques and LLM-based rewriting to deliver high-quality, meaning-preserving text transformations.
The tool supports multiple rewriting modes and quality controls, enabling users to improve clarity, fluency, and tone across academic, professional, and creative writing.
highlights: Built scalable backend services and APIs supporting high-volume paraphrasing with low latency
Implemented mode-based rewriting logic for flexible control over tone, fluency, and creativity
Optimized inference performance through batching, caching, and intelligent request handling
Integrated real-time editing workflows for seamless copy, replace, and compare interactions
Designed validation and fallback mechanisms for consistent output quality under high load
impact: Delivered high-quality paraphrasing at scale for millions of global users
Improved response latency and system stability through backend optimizations
Enhanced user trust through meaning fidelity and linguistic correctness

citationGenerator.title: Citation Generator
citationGenerator.subtitle: Automated Academic & Research Citations
description: QuillBot's Citation Generator is an AI-assisted research tool that helps users automatically generate accurate, properly formatted citations across multiple academic styles.
Contributed to the design and development of the citation generation platform, supporting multiple citation styles and source types within a unified system.
The product simplifies the research and writing workflow by reducing manual citation effort while ensuring consistency, correctness, and academic compliance.
highlights: Built scalable backend services and APIs to transform URLs, identifiers, and metadata into structured citations
Implemented style-specific formatting logic and validation rules for accurate academic standards
Integrated source parsing and metadata extraction pipelines improving citation accuracy
Optimized response latency and throughput for high-volume usage with reliability
Implemented error handling and fallback strategies for incomplete source information
impact: Significantly reduced manual citation effort for students and researchers
Improved accuracy and consistency across all supported citation formats
Delivered a scalable system handling large volumes of concurrent requests

multiSiteCms.title: Multi-Site CMS Platform
multiSiteCms.subtitle: Unified Content Management for Multiple Websites
description: Designed and developed a unified CMS platform powering multiple high-traffic websites from a single codebase with complete frontend UI and backend infrastructure.
Built multi-tenant architecture enabling rapid deployment of new sites with shared components, consistent branding, and centralized content management.
The platform allows efficient scaling, reduced maintenance overhead, and seamless feature rollouts across all properties.
highlights: Architected multi-tenant CMS supporting 4+ production websites from single codebase
Built reusable UI component library ensuring consistent design across all sites
Implemented centralized backend APIs serving multiple frontends efficiently
Developed SEO-optimized page templates achieving high organic search rankings
Created admin dashboard for unified content and configuration management
impact: Reduced development and maintenance effort by 70% through code reuse
Enabled rapid deployment of new sites in days instead of months
Achieved consistent user experience across all platform properties

chatPdf.title: Chat PDF
chatPdf.subtitle: AI-Powered Document Interaction
description: Developed QuillBot's Chat PDF tool, an AI-driven document assistant enabling users to upload PDFs and interact conversationally to extract insights, generate summaries, and answer questions.
Built backend and frontend components to support instant upload, processing, and Q&A interaction with PDF content.
Designed AI-assisted document parsing workflows to efficiently analyze long and complex PDFs.
highlights: Implemented mechanisms to summarize, extract key facts, and answer questions using conversational AI
Optimized performance to deliver fast, accurate responses from large files in real time
Collaborated with product and UX teams for intuitive interaction flows
impact: Enabled quick insight extraction from dense reports and research papers
Improved productivity by eliminating manual searching and reading
Enhanced document utility within QuillBot's ecosystem

speechToText.title: Speech to Text
speechToText.subtitle: Real-Time Audio Transcription
description: Developed the Speech to Text converter, an AI-powered tool that accurately transcribes spoken language into written text in real time.
Built and integrated the speech recognition engine using advanced AI models for accurate transcription.
The feature supports multiple languages and dialects, catering to transcription, note-taking, and accessibility needs.
highlights: Created real-time capture interface for microphone inputs with editing capabilities
Ensured multilingual support and noise-robust processing for diverse audio inputs
Optimized performance for low-latency transcription with real-time feedback
impact: Simplified transcription workflows for meetings and lectures
Enhanced accessibility with accurate text conversion for spoken content
Expanded QuillBot's cross-modal support beyond writing

textToSpeech.title: Text to Speech
textToSpeech.subtitle: Natural Audio Rendering
description: Built the Text to Speech tool, transforming written text into natural, lifelike audio for accessibility, learning, or voice-centric applications.
Integrated advanced voice synthesis models to render natural-sounding audio across multiple languages.
Designed user-friendly interface allowing text input and audio output in customizable formats.
highlights: Developed efficient encoding and processing pipelines for fast audio generation
Ensured output files could be easily downloaded and reused across platforms
Supported multiple languages and voice options
impact: Improved content accessibility for learners and visually impaired users
Enabled audio content creation for podcasts and presentations
Enhanced QuillBot's multimodal engagement capabilities

imageToText.title: Image to Text
imageToText.subtitle: OCR Text Extraction
description: Developed the Image to Text converter, an OCR tool that extracts text from uploaded images including screenshots, scanned notes, and photos.
Integrated OCR frameworks to reliably scan and extract text from uploaded images.
Built an accessible UI for image upload, processing status, and text output.
highlights: Supported common image formats with optimized pipeline for fast processing
Achieved high accuracy text extraction from various image types
Enabled seamless conversion of visual text into editable form
impact: Improved workflow efficiency for digitizing notes and printed content
Empowered users to convert visual text without manual re-typing
Expanded QuillBot's document processing capabilities

qrCodeGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrCodeGenerator.subtitle: Instant Code Creation
description: Delivered the QR Code Generator, a web-based tool that generates high-quality QR codes for URLs, text, contact information, and other digital content.
Built a responsive generator interface allowing users to input content and instantly generate QR codes.
Implemented code rendering logic supporting multiple data types and formats.
highlights: Ensured high-resolution export options suitable for print and digital marketing
Added error-handling and validation for accurate QR code generation
Built fast, zero-friction user experience for instant code creation
impact: Provided users zero-friction way to create and share QR codes
Enhanced QuillBot tool set with practical utility
Supported diverse sharing workflows

wordCloud.title: Word Cloud Generator
wordCloud.subtitle: Visual Text Analysis
description: Contributed to the Word Cloud Generator, designed to help users create expressive visual elements from text that highlight word frequency and themes.
Built frontend interactive UI components to input text and generate graphical outputs.
Implemented data processing logic to derive word frequency and design visual layouts.
highlights: Integrated scalable rendering pipelines for responsive visual generation
Designed export/download features for reports and presentations
Enabled customization of colors, fonts, and layouts
impact: Enabled users to visualize textual insights quickly
Aided brainstorming and research with visual word analysis
Expanded QuillBot's creative utility tools

i18n.title: Website Internationalization
description: Successfully implemented website internationalization (i18n) to support multiple languages and enhance user experience for a global audience.
Developed and integrated custom utility functions to facilitate seamless language switching, content localization, and overall website accessibility for diverse user groups.

grammarChecker.title: Grammar Checker
grammarChecker.subtitle: AI-Powered Writing Quality & Correction
description: QuillBot's Grammar Checker is an AI-driven language quality tool that detects and corrects grammatical, spelling, and stylistic issues in real time.
Contributed to the design and development of the grammar checking system, combining rule-based NLP techniques with ML and LLM-assisted correction pipelines for context-aware suggestions.
The product helps users produce clear, fluent, and professional writing across academic, business, and everyday use cases.
highlights: Built scalable backend services and APIs for high-volume grammar checking with low latency
Implemented real-time feedback mechanisms for seamless view, accept, or reject corrections
Designed error classification and prioritization logic surfacing high-impact issues prominently
Optimized performance through efficient request handling, caching, and async processing
Implemented validation, monitoring, and fallback mechanisms for consistent output quality
impact: Improved writing clarity and correctness for a large global user base
Delivered low-latency, real-time grammar feedback in writing workflows
Increased user trust by balancing accuracy with tone preservation

bigData.title: Big Data Processing and Elasticsearch
description: Designed and implemented high-performance stream and batch processing pipelines using Apache Beam, processing and storing over 160 million JSON records into Elasticsearch for advanced analytics and search capabilities.

ascendLos.title: Ascend LOS/LMS & Android Apps
description: Contributed to the development of Ascend Origination System (AOS) and Ascend Management System (AMS), designed to optimize loan processing workflows for financial institutions. Developed Android apps for both customers and staff to streamline loan application and management processes.

aiChat.title: AI Chat Platform
aiChat.subtitle: Multi-Agent Agentic AI System
description: Designed and delivered a production-grade AI Chat platform built on a multi-agent, agentic AI architecture, enabling users to perform research, document analysis, content generation, and utility-based actions through a single conversational interface.
Architected a multi-agent agentic AI system where a central orchestrator agent dynamically plans tasks, routes tools, and coordinates specialized agents based on user intent and query complexity.
Built an intent detection and intelligent query planning layer that decomposes complex user requests into reliable multi-step execution flows across search, documents, and generative reasoning.
highlights: Engineered in-chat web search with source credibility scoring, relevance ranking, and sentence-level citations for trusted, verifiable AI responses
Delivered document intelligence pipeline with layout-aware parsing, semantic chunking, and hybrid retrieval (vector + keyword search)
Developed layout-aware OCR and image-to-text capabilities supporting multilingual content and structured outputs
Implemented token-aware context management, prompt caching, and dynamic model routing
Designed deterministic utility agents to offload non-generative tasks from LLMs
impact: ~80% reduction in end-to-end response latency via intelligent tool routing
60–70% reduction in AI inference costs through context optimization and caching
Trusted AI outputs through citation-backed search and document grounding

quillbot.title: Software Engineer II
responsibilities: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver product features and provide application support.
Designed user-friendly UI/UX and developed core business logic to enhance functionality and performance.
Maintained SEO-optimized website content and implemented critical features to optimize efficiency.
Built and launched core platform tools: CMS, Paraphrasing Tool, Grammar Checker, QuillBot Flow, Citation Generator, and AI Chat.
Automated web data collection using Puppeteer, node-html-parser, and BeautifulSoup.
Managed projects from requirements to deployment, ensuring user and business needs were met.
quillbot.achievements: Processed and ingested 160M+ JSON records and 20M+ PDFs into Elasticsearch. Created a CMS for SEO, reducing dev time by 80%.

ascend.title: Junior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led design and rollout of comprehensive Loan Origination and Management Systems for web and mobile.
Built robust Android applications for staff and customers, enhancing service efficiency and accessibility.
Streamlined operational processes and reduced manual intervention in loan lifecycle management.
Improved usability and engagement through intuitive interface enhancements.
ascend.achievements: Implemented a digital loan origination system, reducing manual errors and improving efficiency. Developed a loan management system for real-time insights and optimized lifecycle management.
